title: parámetros de dominio
subtitle: traducir: Manage your website domain and SSL certificate.

custom.title: dominio personalizado
custom.subtitle: traducir: Connect your own domain to your website
custom.instructions: traducir: Enter your domain name without http:// or https://

verification.title: verificación del dominio
verification.description: traducir: To verify ownership of your domain, add this DNS record:
verification.name: traducir: Name

ssl.title: certificado ssl
ssl.description: traducir: SSL certificates encrypt the connection between your website and visitors, ensuring their data is secure. It's essential for building trust and improving your search engine ranking.
